en: Hey, #NAME. I know things have been a little weird between us lately, but I appreciate how hard you're working.
Can I take a look at what you're working on?
Hmmm, I see. Wait, is this all you have?
Oh, I'm sorry #NAME! I didn't mean it like that - I just...
You're doing great. I mean it.
...Okay. I understand. If it's not ready, you wouldn't want me getting the wrong idea or something.
No, no. I'm fine. Go ahead and get back to work, okay?
